abstract: Pope Francis, during conversation with reporters on plane to Rome, says Catholic Church should seek forgiveness from gays for persecution they have suffered from church; comments come as response to heightened calls for respect following Orlando, Fla, massacre.
lead_paragraph: The pope also said the Roman Catholic Church should ask forgiveness for the way it has treated women, for turning a blind eye to child labor and for “blessing so many weapons” in the past.

headline.main: Pope Francis Says Church Should Apologize to Gays
headline.print_headline: Pope Francis Says Church Should Apologize to Gays
